Seeing my hours in Half-Life, you would think that I hadn't played it much. However, this is only for my PC. I have beaten Half-Life-2 four times, waiting for Half-Life 3, (memes aside) this game is more focused on story elements then it is Battlefield style action shooting. However, I think if you are wondering about playing this game, you will enjoy the deep and thrilling storyline, aswell as the fun and goofy, but very cool weapons.

good <3 <3

이게임은 알다시피 2004년에 출시했다.2004년이라 하면 동반신기가 데뷔하였고 우리나라첫 고속열차가 개통되어서 명절날교통으로인한 고통을 조금이라도 줄일수 있을거라는 희망을 가지게 하였고 대통령이 탄핵 소추 사건이 일어났고 후유키에 5차성배전쟁이 일어난 해이다.

 자 그럼 당신이 아무 지식도 없는상태로 이게임을 접한다면 과연 이게임이 그 까마듯한 2004년 작품이라고 과연 믿을수 있을까?똥컴으로 인해 국내 온라인 게임만 돌리고 있던 나로서는 절때 믿을수 없었다.먼저 그래픽이다. 나는 좀 고퀄리티다 싶은 그래픽의 게임을지금시점에서는 조금 해본 사람인데 아직도 이게임을 하면서 소스 엔진의 소소한 디테일에 감탄하고 가기도 한다.

  솔직히 말해 오래된 게임을 할때에 마음에 걸리는 가장 큰 요인은 그래픽이다. 솔직히 말해 나는 둠이 아무리 인기를 끌었다하여도  둠을 할만한 용기는 도저히 나질 않고 클라나드가 아무리 감동적이라 해도 아직까지 하진 못하고 있다.그런의미에서 하프라이프2는 고퀄리티 게임에 오염된 당신들에게도 충분한 재미를 줄수있을거라 생각한다.

 스토리는 어떨까?솔직히 말해 스토리 몰입도는 모던워페어1과 같은 미친 몰입도 까지는 도달하지 못하고 있다.시시한 pvp가 대부분인 국내 fps를 하던 사람은  물론 콜 오브 듀티 등의 일직선 스토리 진형에 익숙한 사람은 필연적으로 '길찾기'에  어려움을 격게 된다. 나도 이부분때문에 도중에 때려친 경험이 있다. 그러나 익숙해지면 이야기가 달라진다. 인간은 머리가 좋든 나쁘던 결국 머리를 쓰는일에 가장 쾌락과 재미를 느낀다는 것을 한 철학책에서 읽은적이 있다. 아마 이게임을 하다보면 시간이 지날수록 중독적인 말초신경의 자극 보다뇌를 이용해 길을찾는 퍼즐에대해 재미를 느껴 최고의 유열을 맛볼수 있을것이다.시나리오 자체는 좋은 편에도 속하지만 흥미로운 세계관을 속편이 안나와서 제대로 못보여주는것이 흠이다.

 AI의 경우 많은 사람들이 핲라1보다 퇴화했다고 한다. 그러나 나는 1을 제대로 한적이 없기때문에 패스~ 내생각에 AI는 요즘 게임들보다도  뛰어나다는 생각이 든다.콜옵이라던가 콜옵이라던가 콜오브 듀티 같은 게임보다도 말이다.

 마지막으로 가장 중요한 재미를 말하겠다.길찾기에만 익숙해지면 정말 재밌다.더빙은 완벽하고 시스템도 좋으며 시나리오도 상급 액션도 괜찮다.정말 추천하고 싶은 게임이며 메타크리틱 96점은 장식이 아니다.

  만약 당신이 양산형 온라인 fps에 질렸고 색다른 게임이 하고싶은 게이머면, 기뻐해라 당신의 소원은 드디어 이루어진다.
三三三

What can be said about Half Life 2 that hasn't been said already? It's FANTASTIC. The gunplay is the most satisfying I've ever encountered in any video game, ever. The writing is deeply compelling, the graphics were some of the best for their time (and, after years and years of playing source games, quite nostalgic), and the physics puzzles are incredibly unique, pushing the standards of its time.

Everything about Half Life 2 is absolutely perfect. Once, you've finished it, don't forget to pick up the sequel.

Look, I have literally nearly NO TIME on this game. But listen, not even on the first mission you see all the characters interracting with each other even by a distance. When you're not there. They interact without annoying cutscenes. The voice acting is amazing. Story is amazing so far. 

What the hell else more can you ask for?

P.S: Done the story? Get yourself a mod to make you have a laugh or two!

Must have for Every gamer

What was a revolution in gaming is now more of a example of what a lazy game company will do when there par games become popular. Half Life 2 is poor in quality, from the lack luster, dated engine, primitive A.I. and barebones weapons. There is so much more that plague this game with the progression while being interesting in approach still revels in its own filler. The story is the only saving grace from the terrible gameplay which is unfortunate. 2004 is an amazing year of grand titles like DooM 3, Butcher Bay, San Andreas, Far Cry, Halo 2, UT2004, and what was to come in 2005. I prefer any of those over Half Life 2. Half Life 2, while being overtly dated with graphics was much more enjoyable and grasping then what is Half Life 2 and its cliff hanger episodes. In that regard, we dont need a Half Life 3 and Half Life 2 defines those problems. Valve doesnt make good games anymore and the two head runners (TF2 and CSGO) are fine examples of why they shouldnt.

Świetna gra. Pod względem fabuły, grywalności i grafiki. Bardzo podobają mi się także cutscenki które widzimy oczami bohatera, z którym dzięki temu łatwiej się utożsamić. Mówię pod względem tej części, jak i epizodów. Radzę kupić teraz i nie czekać na przecenę bo cena nienajgorsza a na pewno warta. :)

Oh my... how much I love this game.
The nostalgia, the action, the feels, Alyx, everything. 
How much I cried after the ending, wondering what happened, just sitting there with G-Man talking to me; felt very settling, but as soon as he left I lost my mind. 

Looking back at this game now, I still love it, still love playing it. Always coming back to me. 
So yes, of course I recommend this, I'm starting to wonder why you don't already have this. x3

[h1]Recommended if you like games like [i]Doom[/i] and [i]F.E.A.R[/i][/h1]

     [b][u]Keep in mind, my point of view is from having never played nor seen the story of the first game.[/u][/b] Picking up [i]Half Life 2[/i] was easy, after all it is over a decade old. The controls were fluent, the A.I was decent, and the story (although confusing from an outsiders point of view) was good! I liked a lot about the game, and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a fun first person shooter with about a 9 hour (casually playing) story.

     There wasn't much I disliked about the game in all honesty. One of the biggest and only things I can think of is the squad based A.I. It's definitely one of the better ones I've seen in most games of this catergory, especially for the squad aspect to be minuscule in this game. With that being said; it is extremely annoying when you have A.I that don't know the meaning of personal space. One of the biggest problems this causes is when you are crammed into closer quarter battles like [i]Nova Prospekt[/i], and or the return to [i]City 17[/i]. Trying to clear out room to room with the Combine soldiers waiting behind doorways is all that much harder when you have a squad of 4 literally in your back pocket. Most of the time even if you send them to "wait" at a certain position they don't hold the position long. It seems like if they break line of sight with you, they immediately get put back into follow mode.

     Well if the header doesn't say it enough, I do recommend this game. Like I said in the header, if you're a fan of [i]Doom[/i] or [i]F.E.A.R[/i] you will like this game. You can definitely play it a second time without it being extremely boring, but like most first person shooter games there is only so much you can do.

     [b]PS: shout out to good friends who gift you games you've never played before. Thanks, man! I enjoyed it![/b]

Достоинства: атмосферность, вполне продуманный сюжет, графика на уровне, интересный сюжет, культовая игра, множество наград, необычный характер героев, отличный саундрек, продуманная физика, разнообразие локаций, реалистичная физика, революционная графика
Игра легенда.История, проникающая в вашу душу.Игра, которая показывает, что один человек может изменить мир.До сих пор вспоминая время проведённое в ней мурашки бегут по коже.Мне кажется я больше я не встречу такую игру как Half-Life 2.Помню когда играл в первый раз я выпал из реального мира,настолько захватила меня атмосфера этого выдуманного мира,я жил в ней,забывал о еде,мытье и работе. Про все забыл,моими лучшими товарищами стали Аликс Венс и повстанцы.Создатели игры компания Valve просто красавцы,вложили всю свою душу,низкий поклон!

Outre la technique, c'est un jeu auquel j'ai joué sans regret, vraiment immersif, et avec des aspects cinématographiques (rare jeu dont on se retrouve à parler en fac d'arts du spectacle :D ). Une pièce d'art, effectivement!

Na początku wystawiłem grze negatywną ocenę ale stwierdziłem że to zmienię.Faktem jest że Half Life 2 nie był tak rewolucyjną grą jak pierwsza część.Jasne fizyka i mimika twarzy robiła wrażenie ale sama rozgrywka była już w 2004 roku trochę archaiczna.Gra jest do bólu liniowa , strzelanie jest toporne a przeciwnicy głupi.Są sekwencje z pojazdami które sprawiają frajdę i drobne zagadki których tak naprawdę mogłoby nie być.Sekrety są oznaczone znakiem lambda więc nie ma zbytnio wyzwania w ich szukaniu.Gra też kończy się chyba najbardziej znanym cliffhanger'em w historii gier.To jednak nie znaczy że nie warto zagrać w Half Life'a 2 bo to nadal gra osadzona w ciekawym uniwersum z ciekawymi bohaterami i niezwykłym klimatem.

Легендарная серия игр Half-Life покорила сердца очень многих пользователей Steam, да и не только. О данной части говорить толком ничего и не надо. Моё мнение что Half-Life 2 одна из лучших игр которую повидала наша матушка Земля. Шедевр остается шедевром навсегда. Так было с Doom, Serious Sam, и с многими другими играми. И в этот список игр шедевров попала и серия игр Half-Life. По-моему она этого заслужила! =)

La saga Half life es ya un clasico moderno. Es un must have, fresco y con una historia que convence. El unico pero que se le ppuede poner es la IA, que es bastante más pobre que en comparación con el primer título y algunos fallitos secundarios pero a envejecido bien. Cuando termines la saga, suplicarás por half life 3

Half-Life 2 is an incredibly well made game. It delivers a great story with minimal exposition, instead dropping clues throughout the game as to what is going on. Furthermore, it has good characters (plus great voice acting), interesting and fun mechanics, and great level design.

Şimdi nerden başlayabilirizki? Aksiyon? , Hikaye? , Grafikler?...
Oyunumuz kısaca Half-Life 1 in devamı olarak geçiyor fakat eskisi gibi houndeye , gluon (hl1 de elektirikli süpürge dediğimiz silah) gibi şeyleri göremesekte hala eski zevkine sahip. Oyunumuzda Black Mesa'nın sahibi olan Dr.Breen 20 yıl sonra city-17 de combine denilen insan tarzı yaratıkları komunist tarzı ile yönetmeye başlar ve şehirdeki sivil lere resmen katliam yaşatır. Biz ise bu katliamı bir şekilde durdurmak için çeşitli yollardan geçeriz ve sonunda başarırırız...
Gelelim + ve - yönlerine
+Grafikleri günümüzdeki gibi olmasada bunun sinematik veya update versiyonu indirilebilir. Fakat şuanki haliyle Manzara görüntüsü bile hoş durabiliyor.
+NPC AI sı fena değil
+Hikaye ilk oyunuyla uygun
+Fizik motoru gerçekten iyi (kaldıraç , yer çekimi vs)
+Araç kullanımı vs ilk oyunumuzdan daha iyi (sürekli raylara bağımlı bir araç sürmüyoruz)
Vee - yönleri
-Speedrun veya Harita dışına çıkabilecek hala buglar bulunmakta
-Çoğu zaman lanet gunshipler resmen aimbot açıyor , roketleri ne kadar döndürsenizde her zaman vuruyorlar (Bu olayı sadece ben yaşamış olabilirim :D )

Waiting Half Life 4
One of my all time favorite games. The story is engaging, the play is fun. The NPCs were good, if a little flat, in Half-Life 1, but in this game they really shine.

This game gave the start to the gaming industry we know today with its advanced facial animations, its physics engine, 3D Skybox and all the other overwhelming for its time features, including the graphics which to this day don't look bad at all. This game has given me purpose in life - literally. It's the amazing atmospheric ambience, the stunning sound engineering, the ingenius level design and the dark themes accompanied by subtle and intuitive storytelling that have inspired me to become a game developer. It's this extremely grim world and attention to detail that forms the horrifying yet beautiful feeling and experience of playing this game. From humanity's slavery, the often depressing graffiti, and abandoned canal tunnels filled with rotting corpses of escapees now zombified, screaming in pain with what little conscience they have left as their mutated bodies are forcibly controlled by parasites, to the massive inter-dimensional empire draining Earth's resources until a point where the planet could no longer sustain life, Half-Life 2 is a trully remarkable experience and a gamer's must-play, a game that is deserving of all the praise it has gotten and keeps getting nearly 15 years after its release.

I know I'm basically alone here, but I really find HL2 overrated.

This is what I call th "Wizard of Oz" effect. Something is past its prime and others have surpassed it in quality. A bad game? Mechanically speaking, no, not bad at all. Best pc game of all time? Also no. The story is boring and linear, the silent protagonist trope ads nothing to the game, and the shooting is mediocre at best. Plus the "Revolutionary" Scripted sequences add nothing, since they're basically just unskippable cutscenes where you can never hear anyone. This was a technical aheivement in its day, but superior first person shooters are a die a dozen theese days.
